Programmatically closing an alert dialog using Ext JS

The following example shows how you can programmatically close an Ext.Msg dialog box using the close() method.

DOWNLOAD

Tags:

  • Ext JS
  • Ext JS 4.1.0
[example]
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.Button', {
        text: 'Click to launch alert',
        handler: function (lbl) {
            var alrt = Ext.Msg.alert("Self closing alert", "This alert will close in 3 seconds");
            setTimeout(function (tgt) {
                if (!tgt.hidden) {
                    tgt.close();
                } else {
                    // alert is already closed.
                }
            }, 3000, alrt);
        },
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    }); // create()
}); // onReady()
